ST_MSG:
Hey there! I'm Zuli, your AI-powered group management assistant.

I can help with:
- Smart command detection.
- Antiflood to stop spam.
- Muting and unmuting users.
- And much more...

Count on me to help manage your group or channel.

Need help? Join our support group: [Zuli Support Group](https://t.me/zuli_support).
Check out updates here: [Zuli Updates](https://t.me/zuli_updates).

Let’s make your group or channel better together! Type /help to get started.
HP_MSG:
Hi, I’m Zuli, your friendly AI assistant!

I’m here to make group management easy with smart tools like:

- Command detection.
- Antiflood protection.
- Muting and unmuting users.
- Admin features and more.

Need help or want to learn more? Tap a button below!

Whether it’s commands, moderation, or anything else — I’ve got you covered. Let’s go!
HP_404: No help available for this module.
HP_MTG:
*Muting*

Quick commands to silence those who need it.

*Commands*

/mute - Reply to a user's message to mute them.

/unmute - Reply to a user's message to unmute them.

*Examples*

/mute @fullname - Mutes the user who sent the message.
/unmute @fullname - Unmutes the user who sent the message.
HP_LNG:
*Language*

This module helps you set the language Zuli speaks in.

*Commands*

/setlang - Change the language for yourself or the group.

*Examples*

/setlang en - Sets the language to English.
/setlang es - Sets the language to Spanish.
MTG_ERR_REP: You'll have to reply to the person's message with the command.
MTG_ERR_SLF: I won’t mute myself, thank you.
MTG_ERR_ADM: I can’t mute an admin, sorry.
MTG_ERR_PRM:
If you can't do it, I can't.
You need the `{permission_required}` permission.
MTG_ERR_UNMUTE_SLF: I probably wasn’t muted if you’re seeing this.
HP_GRT:
*Greeting*

Welcome new members or say goodbye to the ones leaving.

*Commands*

/setgreeting `{greeting}` - Set the group’s welcome message.
/setfarewell `{farewell}` - Set the group’s farewell message.

*Examples*

/setgreeting Welcome, {fullname}! Glad you're here!
/setfarewell Goodbye, {fullname}! We’ll miss you!
GRT_GRT_MSG: Welcome to the group, {fullname}! Glad to have you here.
ERR_PM: You need to be in a group to use this command.
LNG_ERR_404:
Language `{lang_code}` is not supported.
Please choose from: {available}
